basics.name: Kevin Zhang
basics.label: Integrated Engineering Student
basics.summary: Undergraduate Integrated Engineering student at UBC with hands‑on experience in embedded systems, PCB design, and software-defined radio through coursework, research, and student design teams.

courses: CPEN 312 – Digital Systems and Microcomputers (in progress)

projects.name: 6502 Breadboard Computer
projects.description: Replicated Ben Eater’s 65C02 computer on breadboards, built a 555‑timer clock module, used an Arduino Mega to monitor bus signals, and began designing a DIY EEPROM programmer.

projects.name: Bluetooth‑Controlled Line‑Following Robot
projects.description: Designed IR reflectance sensor array, 3D‑printed mounts, and implemented FreeRTOS‑based ESP32 firmware for Bluetooth telemetry and motor control.

projects.name: ALEASAT Antenna Deployer PCB (ESA Fly Your Satellite!)
projects.description: Performed vibration and functional testing of satellite antenna‑deployer PCB in Belgium and presented resonance search data to ESA engineers for next‑rev design decisions.

projects.name: 3Describe — “Touchable” AR Cubes
projects.description: Used Intel RealSense D435 depth camera and MediaPipe to detect hand and cube position; rendered cubes with OpenCV and applied collision logic to trigger haptic feedback.

projects.name: PlasRov Micro‑plastics ROV
projects.description: Built a 3D‑printed rover combining NIR spectroscopy and TensorFlow‑based object detection to identify microplastics; showcased at regional science fair.

work.name: BC Cancer Research Center – Interactive Oncology
highlights: Located EMI sources in medical device using oscilloscope and wire probe.
Designed aluminum shielding enclosure in Protocase Designer, balancing cost, rigidity, and conductivity constraints while integrating with SolidWorks assembly model.

work.name: University of British Columbia
highlights: Facilitate two weekly lab sections (~30 students) and invigilate quizzes.
Assess 30 code submissions per week, providing feedback on style and correctness.
Promote UBC Orbit design team through short recruitment pitches.

work.name: UBC Orbit Satellite Design Team
highlights: Developed FM receiver flowgraph in GNU Radio and verified C1110 transceiver TX.
Characterized Ettus B210 SDR receiver sensitivity with spectrum analyzer.
Designed antenna‑deployer PCB in Altium Designer.

volunteer.summary: Managed attendee flow at concerts and exhibition hall; guided guests and ensured rule compliance.
Evaluated 20+ high‑school science projects, provided feedback, and participated in ranking deliberations.
Taught aviation & aerospace topics to 20 cadets and helped squadron transition back to in‑person training post‑COVID.
